((( Thanks Icedeamon;Note to Yanshosh I am leaving Megaprime in 
Icedemaons control)))

::the bluelight that engulffed firestorm touched down smoothly on 
earth at Firestorms ship while the following stasis pod landed 
without so much ease,the scaner turned on and it scanned a chameleon 
that was changing color and the scanner went away,the pod opened and 
so did the changed firestorm::

SageFirestorm-Where am I?

Changeling-you on earth,rember the Sages sent you and I am Changeling 
,your ally.It seems they have erased all of you past memories except 
from the ship where you were called from,the gurdians are here at 
this base.

::not only had Sagefirestorm lost his memory his appearnce was also 
diffrent he had grown a foot or two and blue stripes were on his 
body.His weapons were also new.with a single launcher instead of the 
double but they had 1 on the top and bottom of his right arm while 
his left arm also carried a weapon and he had an extendable/ 
retarctable staff instead of his sword.sagefirestorm knew he had 
something on his left arm but he could not yet use it::

Sagefirestorm-Well might as well go see if the gurdians are around
